def-en: In the context of mathematics, to change data according to some function (for example, to bound them on a given interval).
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs matamaitice, sonraí a athrú le feidhm éigin (mar shampla, chun iad a chuimsiú ar eatramh éigin).
notes: Téarma díreach ar fáil ó Stórchiste i gcomhthéacs matamaitice.
